channel.title: Making server silabsoft only, no mopar
channel.description: Is there a way so i can make it so that you can only log in on silabsoft and not mopar. I want it so they can log in, but then it says"you need to be running silabsoft to play this server", and then kick them.

item.title: Making server silabsoft only, no mopar
item.dc:creator: @Whitey_b Whitey b
item.description:

Dont direct frames crash mopar?

[/quote]There is no fucking code, you have to add the stuff yourself. Why bother posting when you clearly have no idea about a thing?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2007, 08:40:14 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Monkey wacko link=topic=199225.msg1773584#msg1773584 date=1190500233]
Delete the code that kicks them when they log on with mopar, it should be in client.java
[/quote]There is no fucking code, you have to add the stuff yourself. Why bother posting when you clearly have no idea about a thing?[/quote]
